channel.title: CVE Feed for cvscvstechcom -- Exit Notifier
channel.description: The latest CVEs for cvscvstechcom -- Exit Notifier

item.title: CVE-2024-8730|2024-09-13T15:31:45.328Z -- cvscvstechcom -- exit%20notifier
item.description: The Exit Notifier plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 1.9.1. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
